roleset.name: come forth
roleset.note: FORTHCOME-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT; adjectival usage based on BOLT-4,5. No VNcls. (from forthcome.01-v)
FORTHCOMING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from forthcoming.01-j)

example.name: verbal rel: arg1
example.text: ?If at the end of that time ransom were not forthcoming death would forthcome.?

example.name: Adjectival rel: forthcoming; ArgMs
example.text: And depending on which way the American election goes American support may not be forthcoming if someone like Ron Paul gets elected
example.arg: depending on which way the American election goes
if someone like Ron Paul gets elected
